std::shared_ptr<TriangleMesh> Meshes::scene1()
{
	auto meshOut = std::make_shared<TriangleMesh>();
	ngl::Vec3 t1v0(-15.452885,-115.976723,139.199783);
	ngl::Vec3 t1v1(15.452885,-115.976723,139.199783);
	ngl::Vec3 t1v2(-15.452885,-37.871704,139.199783);
	ngl::Vec3 t1n0(0.000000,0.000000,1.000000);
	ngl::Vec3 t1n1(0.000000,0.000000,1.000000);
	ngl::Vec3 t1n2(0.000000,0.000000,1.000000);
	Triangle t1(t1v0, t1v1, t1v2, t1n0, t1n1, t1n2);
	meshOut->addTri(t1);
